title: New: Odina – Why'd You Make Me Cry
body:
There’s a rawness and openness to **Odina’s** songwriting that’s rare to hear nowadays; refreshing in an age where producers often polish tracks to within an inch of squeezing every last drop of personality from them.

With an EP last year proving a favourite across a host of Spotify playlists and music blogs alike, she’s released her first new material of 2017, in the form of the heart-wrenching _Why’d You Make Me Cry_. A plea to a leaving lover, it’s somewhere between the elegance of Daughter and the stomach-churning honesty of Keaton Henson. Check it out below.

_goodnight and goodbye / have different meanings_
